name: Sarbajit Kumar De
punchline: I turn messy ideas into shipped products.
about: I’m an AI/ML and Full-Stack Engineer passionate about turning complex ideas into real, deployable products. I enjoy blending intelligent automation with clean design — whether it’s a FastAPI backend, a React frontend, or a machine-learning model that actually solves a user’s problem. My interests lie at the intersection of applied AI, cybersecurity, and system design. I love exploring how data, models, and human creativity can work together to build experiences that are fast, meaningful, and reliable. Outside of coding, I spend time experimenting with visual design and mentoring peers to explore the tech-entrepreneurial side of engineering.
